4314000.name: Dark Leaches
4314000.description:
Alone in your remote cabin something feels off. You hear these odd sounds every night. Like bones cracking from somewhere far beyond. However tonight something was different, it felt closer than ever before. Everything in your house seems to turn off at moment’s notice. Which forced you to investigate outside the cabin in the dark for the first time…

Dark Leaches is an indie survival horror game that capitalizes isolation, silence, and the unknown work against you. This game will bring on the fear of the unknown to the player. Follow the mysteries of the dark cabin and explore the surrounding woods, uncover hidden clues, and piece together the truth behind the Dark Leaches that are drawn to it.

This game build tension slowly and uses the environment and unsettling discoveries to draw the user into its atmosphere. Once the Dark Leaches have lured you into your trap, prepare to fight.

Dark Leaches is designed to keep players uneasy, using darkness, sound design, and unpredictability to build fear. While not graphically extreme, the game relies heavily on atmosphere, surprise, and psychological pressure.

The game will receive ongoing updates, including new puzzles, locations, and story elements. Player feedback and suggestions directly influence future content, making the experience evolve over time.

The developer is open to suggestions and would love to create additional content based on user suggestions to support the game.

Remember this,
Sometimes when you enter the woods, not everything wants you to leave.
4314000.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
